      void loadObjects(java.lang.String path, int lives, int time)
      Loads the map from the level file
      void resetLevel()
      Resets the level, all dead enemies respawn and all objects move back to their original positions.
      void tick()
      To be executed once every frame, calls BombGuy.tick(), tickBombs(), tickTimer(), tickEnemies() to call the tick method of every object on the map
      void tickBombs()
      Calls Bomb.tick() for every bomb on the map, if any of the bombs make contact with the player, Bomb.tick() returns true and method returns
      void tickEnemies()
      Calls Enemy.tick() for every enemy on the map
      void tickTimer()
      Decrements the fps timer every execution, if fps timer reaches 0, the real-time timer is decremented as a second has elapsed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String path,
           int lives,
           int time,
           processing.core.PImage[] Wall_s,
           processing.core.PImage[] UI_s,
           processing.core.PImage[][] Bomb_s,
           processing.core.PImage[][] BombGuy_s,
           processing.core.PImage[][] Red_s,
           processing.core.PImage[][] Yellow_s)
        Map constructor, requires the path of the level file in which the map is immediately constructed, and all GameObjects loaded with. Additionally, all sprite objects required.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the level file
        lives - number of lives that the player should start with
        time - amount of time that the map allows
        Wall_s - sprite array for all wall sprites, loaded from Img.loadWall(PApplet app)
        UI_s - sprites for UI, loaded from Img.loadUI(PApplet app)
        Bomb_s - sprite array for bomb sprites, loaded from Img.loadBomb(PApplet app)
        BombGuy_s - sprite array for BombGuy sprites, loaded from Img.loadBombGuy(PApplet app)
        Red_s - sprite array for red enemy sprites, loaded from Img.loadRed(PApplet app)
        Yellow_s - sprite array for yellow enemy sprites, loaded from Img.loadYellow(PApplet app)

    • Method Detail

      • getEnemies

        public java.util.List<Enemy> getEnemies()
        Returns:
        array of enemies currently alive within the map

      • getEnemiesDead

        public java.util.List<Enemy> getEnemiesDead()
        gets enemies that were killed and tranferred to dead enemy array
        Returns:
        array of enemies currently dead within the map

      • getPlayer

        public BombGuy getPlayer()
        Returns:
        the player

      • getBombs

        public java.util.List<Bomb> getBombs()
        Returns:
        ArrayList of bombs within the map

      • getFPSTimer

        public int getFPSTimer()
        Returns:
        the current FPS timer (amount of frames until the next real-time second)

      • addBomb

        public void addBomb()
        calls the Bomb constructor and adds a new Bomb to the map at the player's current position

      • tick

        public void tick()
        To be executed once every frame, calls BombGuy.tick(), tickBombs(), tickTimer(), tickEnemies() to call the tick method of every object on the map

      • tickBombs

        public void tickBombs()
        Calls Bomb.tick() for every bomb on the map, if any of the bombs make contact with the player, Bomb.tick() returns true and method returns

      • tickTimer

        public void tickTimer()
        Decrements the fps timer every execution, if fps timer reaches 0, the real-time timer is decremented as a second has elapsed. Fps timer reset to 60

      • tickEnemies

        public void tickEnemies()
        Calls Enemy.tick() for every enemy on the map

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        Returns:
        the amount of seconds left on the timer

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Calls the draw() method for every object on the map
        Parameters:
        app - applet for which images are displayed on

      • getMap

        public Tile[][] getMap()
        Gets the tile array of the map
        Returns:
        tile array of the map

      • constructMap

        public void constructMap(java.lang.String path)
        Constructs the map from the level file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the level file

      • loadObjects

        public void loadObjects(java.lang.String path,
                        int lives,
                        int time)
        Loads the map from the level file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the level file
        lives - the number of lives that BombGuy should begin with
        time - the amount of time that the map should have

      • resetLevel

        public void resetLevel()
        Resets the level, all dead enemies respawn and all objects move back to their original positions. The number of lives remaining and the timer is not reset.
